desc.p: CIPHER.METHOD should have a list of methods supported by JBase decrypt command picked up from EB.LOOKUP list. User needs to specify the cipher method with "." instead of "_". T24 will convert back to "_". e.g. "JBASE_CRYPT_RC2" should be specified as "JBASE.CRYPT.RC2"

1. Has specified options - JBASE.CRYPT.GENERAL, JBASE.CRYPT.ROT13, JBASE.CRYPT.XOR11, JBASE.CRYPT.RC2, JBASE.CRYPT.BASE64, JBASE.CRYPT.DES, JBASE.CRYPT.3DES, JBASE.CRYPT.BLOWFISH, JBASE.CRYPT.BASE64.MASK, JBASE.CRYPT.RC2.BASE64, JBASE.CRYPT.DES.BASE64, JBASE.CRYPT.3DES.BASE64, JBASE.CRYPT.BLOWFISH.BASE64
3. Need not specify a MESSAGE.DECRYPT.KEY if the CIPHER.METHOD is "JBASE.CRYPT.ROT13"
MESSAGE.DECRYPT.KEY holds the Decryption Key (which is same as that used for Encryption).
